title: U.S.-Style Service and Arrangement Mobile Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic service terminology and English communication skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational environment using mobile devices and VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can perform the 5-step U.S. restaurant service procedure via VR simulation with 90% accuracy.
Learners can design U.S. table-setting standards (formal/casual) using digital tools with 85% accuracy.
Learners can appropriately apply intercultural communication strategies in mobile learning based on customer scenarios with over 80% proficiency.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
